relationships.evidence_text: Welcome to the Y on Earth community podcast. I'm your host, Aaron William Perry.
And we actually met in middle school, played some music together, had a lot of fun over the years.
Nick Chambers is the founder of Living Arts Systems.
it's actually a real joy and honor for me to be able to do this episode to discuss a lot of the great work Nick that you've been doing in the sustainability movement.
as somebody demonstrating what can be done with home studying.
also as an educator teaching folks all kinds of appropriate technology solutions.
he has worked in the Colorado local food movement, specifically in food distribution.
He currently serves as the founding general manager for the Valley Roots food hub.
